html:
4.18.18  9:12 am   do you have any big inspirations?

     my biggest and most profound inspiration is the entire world

4.18.18  9:11 am   How long does it take to animate one of your videos?

     ah that depends which one

4.18.18  8:53 am   bill how do i write meaningful lyrics?(aka lyrics that sound thought out, and pack a punch) if i write lyrics enough, will i get better at this? should i study other lyrics? help

     the best hint i can give you is that lyrics work best with the music. and the music always seems to work better with the lyrics. the music and lyrics are meant to be together, and i think if they are separated they can suffer separation anxiety and dissociation

4.18.18  8:44 am   I've been wondering... what's the next video called?

     i can't tell you

4.18.18  8:11 am   do a cover of Africa by toto please!!!!!!!!!!

     i think there are probably other toto songs that are in more dire need of covering

4.18.18  7:51 am   4.17.18  10:01 pm what the frick is a pre-intro?

     maybe something like this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this, or this. or for some examples of ones by other people, how about this, or this, or this

4.18.18  7:31 am   On a scale from one to ten, how gay are you (I'm asking for a friend).

     if you are asking me what type of genitals i prefer i am afraid i can't talk about that sort of thing here

4.18.18  6:46 am   what is impossible?

     7.25.17  8:58 pm

4.18.18  6:45 am   why you release trailer piece by piece?

     i don't

     to making interesting? just ask

4.18.18  5:48 am   Are you better at scoring a video with music or making a video to go with a music piece?

     you will have to decide

4.18.18  4:09 am   What made you decide to draw a face on your characters starting from hi I'm Steve onwards?

     i started drawing for history of the entire world, and it has been part of my repertoire ever since. the reason i started drawing for history of the entire world is that video is long and crazy and i needed all the tricks i could get

4.18.18  1:12 am   Cmon bill, how the heck the video not done yet?

     you make an intelligent argument, but the reason it is not done yet is because i am working on it as fast as possible whilst also trying to make it as good as i can.

4.18.18  12:47 am   can you get bloody hands from playing drums like in the whiplash movie?

     probably not unless you are playing with knives and holding them by the blade

4.18.18  12:31 am   How has the increase in channel popularity (through something like history of the entire world.) affected your creativity,

     no

     have you felt compelled to do more videos?

     i've always tried to do as many as humanly possible. i've been working as fast as i can non stop since early 2014

     btw luv ur stuff bb thanx for the content also update ur notebook

     i'm working on videos right now instead

4.17.18  11:54 pm   peanut butter or cheese?

     i see neither, did you forget the attachment

4.17.18  11:26 pm   do you believe in yourself

     yes

4.17.18  11:11 pm   4.17.18  7:32 am   What decade of the 1800s? Because it could go from Beethoven to Scott Joplin. Or would that reveal too much?

     more like something you would sing and play on a banjo whilst working on the railroad, or coming around the mountain, or something of that nature

4.17.18  10:59 pm   4.17.18  10:07 am

Have you lifted the "mr wurtz" embargo?

     what the heck is an embargo, please don't call me mr. wurtz

4.17.18  10:35 pm   The chord "Bm9" is B, D, F#, A, C#?

     yes but don't forget the notes can be in any order, with B in the bass

     or is the last note C?

     no

4.17.18  10:24 pm   should i start making art when im 14?

     sure

      i feel like i'll end up in a cringe compilation.

     not if you don't show anyone yet

4.17.18  10:07 pm   2 POSTS IN 1 DAY ON INSTAGRAM? WHAT COULD THIS MEAN?

     i think they were at least 20 hours apart

4.17.18  10:02 pm   do you work on your anything videos and music(videos) at the same time?

     i've found that i get much better results when i focus on 1 main project at a time

4.17.18  10:01 pm   why don't you just upload the song to your website now?

     2 reasons. one is there are still a couple tiny adjustments i have to make, specifically the pre-intro. the other reason is when i do songs with videos i think it makes for a much stronger release if they are both released at the same time

4.17.18  9:34 pm   what is your opinion on peanut butter pls

     it is not good for a house decoration but it works well for the foundation

4.17.18  9:17 pm   what's not green

     orange chicken

4.17.18  8:20 pm   have you been working on the current Thing since the day u uploaded the unboxing video

     of course

4.17.18  7:14 pm   Do you think that the individual stories and ideas that people project on and associate with art are what makes the art art

     there are many more things that could make art art

      and therefore that anything could be considered art?

     anything could be considered art, but for many more reasons

4.17.18  7:12 pm   What's your opinion on this website?

     not evil nor sinful, nor a conduit of evil spirits such as lucifer

4.17.18  7:03 pm   What's with the purple guy with spiky hair?

Are we going to have to wait for the new video to find out?

     yes

4.17.18  7:00 pm   If you became the grammar king, and could control all the grammar rules, which rules would you change?

     the rules are fine. what we need is a more active police force

4.17.18  6:59 pm   Whats your favorite sauce? 

     special

4.17.18  6:24 pm   is it ok if i remove god from universe

     sure if you can figure out what that is

4.17.18  5:39 pm   4.16.18 8:08 pm    what about for stuff that isnt purcussion related

     whatever clef(s) your audience knows, and/or also matches the range of the part

4.17.18  3:45 pm   it seems that making paved roads is both the smartest and the most stupid thing humans have done so far, do you think that is a reasonable observation

     it doesn't seem that stupid but maybe there is something else i don't know

4.17.18  3:16 pm   help im at school what am i soppost to do

     go through puberty and be confused about life, love, and the future?

4.17.18  1:48 pm   should I be paying attention in my Vibrations class instead of reading all the answers to your questions?

     i don't know but what is vibrations class? that sounds cool

4.17.18  1:43 pm   4.16.18  8:08 pm What's rhythm clef? Is that where each line corresponds to a different percussion instrument/part of a drum kit?

     yes

4.17.18  1:24 pm   do you think you rushed the production of hotewig?

     yes but if i didn't it would have taken even longer. it took 11 months in total

4.17.18  1:21 pm   Is holding the shift key while having caps lock on a good idea?

     in most programs it is not useful but there might be a situation where it is useful

4.17.18  12:44 pm   Do you usually have a starting point for writing a song like a melody or chord progression or do you have have ideas lyrically and then find music to match? Or does it always depend? 

     the lyrics and the music are inseparable

4.17.18  10:57 am   what is a good song?

     they are all bad, unfortunately

4.17.18  10:07 am   4.16.18  12:16 pm    What are your business hours?
     12am-12am, mon-sun

this could mean that you work all the time or you never ever work, pretty clever mr wurtz

     that's actually not what i meant. i was going to say 12am to 1159 pm, but then someone (probably you i assume) would point out that that doesn't include 1 minute

4.17.18  9:53 am   do your songs actually have any hidden meaning?

     they mean i am the illuminati president 666 confirmed and i will be running for a 4th term please #vote

4.17.18  9:36 am   What's your opinion on the fact that Mickey mouse and Disney have extended the time when copyrighted materials pass into fair use by about 50 years total, whenever Mickey's about to pass into the public domain?

     that sounds like a strong and good business plan, with vitality and longevity

4.17.18  9:34 am   How to be unoriginal. Please help, I'm too unique, I think.

     try a different sponge bob meme, one that is less unique other than the ones people normally do

4.17.18  9:28 am   If I'm a mime, is it allowed in the "Mime Rules" for me to type like this? Or does the computer I use have to be imaginary, like my clothes?

     the rule book is invisible so i'm not sure

4.17.18  9:27 am   The rumor come out? does Bill wurtz is gay? 

     i will have to check the news papers

4.17.18  9:12 am   how to climb down mountains?

     you can't. you are stuck there once you get to the top

4.17.18  8:57 am   Are you doing more songs like La de da de da de da de day oh in the future? loved it.

     oh hell fuckin yeah sure fuck darn sure heck yes don't even think twice helga

4.17.18  7:32 am   what is the first cycle of chords on the new song

     the entire verse is 1 cycle (8 bars). and it sounds like a chord sequence that would have been popular in the 1800s
